10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"Whoever performs wudu' and does it well, then sets out for the Masjid and finds that the people have already prayed, Allah will decree for him a reward like that of those who attended (the prayer), without reducing the slightest from their reward

chapter.eng-name: "Catching the congregation" (when is one regarded As having caught up with the congregation)
